unnormalised: Interesting transfers this season in the League. East Bengal's acquisition of Arjun Das could be a game-changer, reminds one of Chak De! India. Mohun Bagan's investment of Rs. 5 Cr in young talents like Rohan Sharma from the academy is crucial. Can these players traverse 1500 km and adapt to Kolkata's climate and pressure? A lot depends on their training at the SAI complex too. Dates of joining need confirmation.
